title: A Moonshot Guide to Changing Capitalism
itunes:title: A Moonshot Guide to Changing Capitalism
description: Mariana Mazzucato talks with Rob Johnson about her new book, The Mission Economy, and what we need to do to make innovation work for global shared prosperity.
